price: (Èyí ń ṣẹlẹ̀) nítorí kí (Allāhu) lè fi ohun tí Èṣù ń jù (sínú rẹ̀) ṣe àdánwò fún àwọn tí àìsàn ń bẹ nínú ọkàn wọn àti àwọn tí ọkàn wọn le. Dájúdájú àwọn alábòsí sì wà nínú ìyapa tó jìnnà (sí òdodo).
arabic: لِّيَجۡعَلَ مَا يُلۡقِي ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ لَفِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: liyajʿala mā yul'qī al-shayṭānu fit'natan lilladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun wal-qāsiyati qulūbuhum wa-inna al-ẓālimīna lafī shiqāqin baʿīdin
